page.title: 14Wragby_Children's Leisure
page.content:
{BROWNIES { {Brownies}is held at the {Youth {Club}on Wednesdays.It is run by Mrs.Bodily and Mrs. Shaw.Miss Lingard helps.You have to be 7 years old to start.All Brownies have a uniform. We wear a brown dress and a yellow sort of tie.Our tie has a silver pixie on it.
Brownies lasts from 17.00 to 18.30 and we pay a{15p subscription}each week.You have to be{7 years old}before you can start.We make lots of different things and play games.At Christmas,we act out a play in the church. When you become a Brownie, you are supposed to think of others before yourself and to do a good turn every day.
